trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> (or another <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation).
trans-unit.target: Associa un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> per un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> (o un altro <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementazione).</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: A MouseBinding associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Associa un MouseBinding un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>è l'implementazione di primaria il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>interfaccia per il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] sistema dei comandi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: In generale, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>viene eseguita, viene richiamato il comando, anche se il comportamento del comando è influenzato ulteriormente da fattori specifici di comando, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui comandi, vedere il [panoramica dei comandi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When defining a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si definisce un MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], esistono due modi per specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: Il primo modo per stabilire un MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>attributo dell'elemento MouseBinding, che consente una sintassi specificare i modificatori e le azioni del mouse in un'unica stringa, ad esempio, "CTRL + LeftClick".</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo modo consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>attributo dell'elemento MouseBinding.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>sono equivalenti e modificare lo stesso oggetto sottostante, ma ci sarà un conflitto se entrambi vengono utilizzati.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>gli attributi sono impostati entrambi, il movimento non è valido.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], anche se non si specificano modificatori; ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione in forma più semplice per la serializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A MouseBinding can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Un MouseBinding possono essere definite in un oggetto specifico o a livello di classe registrando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>nella <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a MouseBinding is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more MouseBinding or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: Il modo più comune per definire un MouseBinding è all'interno del modello di controllo, impostando il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>proprietà in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] dichiarando uno o più MouseBinding o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref> classe mediante la combinazione di mouse e comando specificata.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Il comando associato all'azione.

trans-unit.source: The gesture associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: L'azione associata al comando.

trans-unit.source: Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia i valori di base (non animati) delle proprietà dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia i valori correnti delle proprietà dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'azione associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>È un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>con o senza un set di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>una <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>non è necessario disporre di un tasto di modifica associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The gesture.
trans-unit.target: Il movimento.

trans-unit.source: Gesture is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Movimento è impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'istanza un clone bloccato dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> utilizzando i valori di proprietà di base (non animati).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'istanza corrente di un clone bloccato dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto ha proprietà di dipendenza animate, i valori animati correnti vengono copiati.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref> associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>non deve essere associato a un tasto di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>da solo, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>, può essere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> valido</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>

trans-unit.source: The mouse action.
trans-unit.target: L'azione del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
